alert.note: Alert for Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 16 at 12:45AM CDT until April 16 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LEAKE...NORTHEASTERN RANKIN...NORTHWESTERN SCOTT AND EAST CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES... At 1245 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Farmhaven, or 12 miles east of Canton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Forkville, Farmhaven, Branch, Ludlow, Sharon and Lena. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
